headline.main: FBI: Man Linked to LGBT Threats Facing Federal Charge
headline.print_headline: FBI: Man Linked to LGBT Threats Facing Federal Charge

docs.snippet: A man linked to social media posts threatening a Pulse-style attack against the LGBT community in South Florida was arrested by the Florida Highway Patrol on an unrelated charge....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man linked to social media posts threatening a Pulse-style attack against the LGBT community in South Florida was arrested by the Florida Highway Patrol on an unrelated charge.

headline.main: UK PM May Charts Collision Course With Brexiteers Over Immigration
headline.print_headline: UK PM May Charts Collision Course With Brexiteers Over Immigration

docs.snippet: British Prime Minister Theresa May cast doubt on Sunday on the effectiveness of 'points-based' immigration systems that screen applicants on the basis of factors like education and skills, setting up a potential conflict with some of her own minis...
docs.lead_paragraph: British Prime Minister Theresa May cast doubt on Sunday on the effectiveness of 'points-based' immigration systems that screen applicants on the basis of factors like education and skills, setting up a potential conflict with some of her own ministers.

headline.main: Nemechek Earns Controversial Win Over Custer in Canada
headline.print_headline: Nemechek Earns Controversial Win Over Custer in Canada

docs.snippet: John Nemechek raced Cole Custer door-to-door through the grass as their trucks barreled to the finish line at Canadian Tire Motorsport Park. The rough racing to the checkered flag required a lengthy review by NASCAR before Nemechek was declared th...
docs.lead_paragraph: John Nemechek raced Cole Custer door-to-door through the grass as their trucks barreled to the finish line at Canadian Tire Motorsport Park. The rough racing to the checkered flag required a lengthy review by NASCAR before Nemechek was declared the winner Sunday.

headline.main: Angels' Matt Shoemaker Leaves After Being Hit by Line Drive
headline.print_headline: Angels' Matt Shoemaker Leaves After Being Hit by Line Drive

docs.snippet: Los Angeles Angels pitcher Matt Shoemaker left Sunday's game against the Seattle Mariners after being hit in the head by a line drive off the bat of Kyle Seager....
docs.lead_paragraph: Los Angeles Angels pitcher Matt Shoemaker left Sunday's game against the Seattle Mariners after being hit in the head by a line drive off the bat of Kyle Seager.

headline.main: UK PM May Says to Set Out Proposals on Corporate Behavior This Year
headline.print_headline: UK PM May Says to Set Out Proposals on Corporate Behavior This Year

docs.snippet: The British government will put forward proposals later this year aimed at improving corporate behavior, including tackling excessive executive pay, British Prime Minister Theresa May said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The British government will put forward proposals later this year aimed at improving corporate behavior, including tackling excessive executive pay, British Prime Minister Theresa May said on Sunday.

headline.main: Yankees Beat Orioles 5-2 to Salvage Finale of 3-Game Series
headline.print_headline: Yankees Beat Orioles 5-2 to Salvage Finale of 3-Game Series

docs.snippet: Coming off two straight shutout losses and precariously close to dropping out of serious playoff contention, the New York Yankees desperately needed a victory....
docs.lead_paragraph: Coming off two straight shutout losses and precariously close to dropping out of serious playoff contention, the New York Yankees desperately needed a victory.

headline.main: Tsonga Drops Sock to Reach U.S. Open Quarters
headline.print_headline: Tsonga Drops Sock to Reach U.S. Open Quarters

docs.snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga booked his third trip to the U.S. Open quarter-finals by dropping American Jack Sock in four sets in their fourth-round match at Flushing Meadows on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga booked his third trip to the U.S. Open quarter-finals by dropping American Jack Sock in four sets in their fourth-round match at Flushing Meadows on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Santana Homers Twice to Lead Brewers' 10-0 Rout of Pirates

headline.main: Merkel in Trouble After Election Debacle for Her Pro-Refugee Stance
headline.print_headline: Merkel in Trouble After Election Debacle for Her Pro-Refugee Stance

docs.snippet: A humiliating state election defeat for Angela Merkel in her own backyard on Sunday and another drubbing that looms in two weeks in Berlin are casting an ominous shadow over the Chancellor's hopes of winning - or even running - for a fourth term i...
docs.lead_paragraph: A humiliating state election defeat for Angela Merkel in her own backyard on Sunday and another drubbing that looms in two weeks in Berlin are casting an ominous shadow over the Chancellor's hopes of winning - or even running - for a fourth term in 2017.
